<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update Custom URL Category</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/v1/config/rulestacks/{rulestackname}/urlcustomcategories/{name}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Modify the custom URL category of a specified rulestack.


## Request
